name: Space (DuckRaGod)
description:
Game where you moving one direction but by hitting space you change direction you need to destroy asteroids that falling to the middle.

space - change direction.

escape - close game.

github - https://github.com/DuckRaGod/space-game.

font - https://dharmatype.com "Bebas Neue".
